newsitem.title: BELGIUM: BRUSSELS BEL-20 INDEX RISES 1.02 PERCENT.
newsitem.headline: BRUSSELS BEL-20 INDEX RISES 1.02 PERCENT.

text.p: The Brussels Bel-20 share index rose more than one percent in early afternoon trading on Monday, more then recouping Friday's losses and less than 10 points off its life high of 2,233.65.
At 1235 GMT the bourse was 1.03 percent higher at 2,224.91 points, although traders noted that only one billion francs of Belgian shares had changed hands.
